ModMetaData.name: Exotic Joy
ModMetaData.author: ✬Rustic Fox✬
ModMetaData.description:
A mod that adds the abillity to build Telescops, Megascreen Tv's and removes the max tech level of hoopstone and game of ur so you can now use the when ever.
Research
Telescope 1000 Requires MicroelectronicsBasics Megascreen 4000 Requires Flatscreen and MicroelectronicsBasics
Version: 2.0.0
